name: Lucas Mendonça
description:
I am a Senior Front-End Developer with 7+ years of experience building high-performance web apps. I have a strong background in React, Angular, Next.js, and TypeScript, and I specialize in creating custom components with responsive designs.
 I am used to collaborating with cross-functional teams in agile methodologies to turn Figma designs into clean and maintainable code. I am known for fixing bugs quickly, delivering quality features, and ensuring high test coverage through both automated and manual testing. I am also studying Node.js to improve my skills.
softSkillsDescription: I communicate clearly, even when working remotely. I really enjoy mentoring junior developers and helping colleagues. I am always open to feedback and learning new things. I am organized and consistently deliver ahead of deadlines. I am also quick at spotting and solving problems, and always looking for the best solutions for each case.
